page.title: 15Holidays in Sand Bay & WSM
page.content: I think people come to Sand Bay and Weston-super-Mare for their holidays because it is a change from their own homes.There are a few amenities in Weston like the tropicana .The Grand Pier is also a big attraction.If people live in cities like London and Birmingham they want to get away to the sea and sand.Although there is a lot of mud and the tide is hardly in it is quite a nice holiday resort. There are a lot of caravan sites here. At Sand Bay there is a large holiday camp called Pontins which was built before the 2nd World War.It was taken over in 1947 by Bass,a company of brewers.Pontins is very busy in the summer and people enjoy it so much that they go again.People usually stay a week and enjoy many activities. Pontins is just for adults and it can take 650 guests.
